name: Website Redesign
details: Redesign the company website for better usability and visual appeal.

todos.title: Research modern web design trends
todos.description: Analyze popular websites for current design patterns and UX best practices.

todos.title: Choose color scheme
todos.description: Decide on a modern, accessible color palette for the redesign.

todos.title: Create mockups
todos.description: Design preliminary mockups for review and feedback.

todos.title: Client feedback
todos.description: Gather feedback from the client on initial mockups.

name: Mobile App Launch
details: Prepare for the launch of the new mobile app.

todos.title: Finalize app features
todos.description: Confirm final feature list with the development team.

todos.title: Marketing campaign planning
todos.description: Develop a social media and ad campaign plan.

todos.title: Create press release
todos.description: Write and distribute press release for app launch.

todos.title: Testing & QA
todos.description: Perform final testing and bug fixes.

todos.title: App store submission
todos.description: Submit app for approval on Apple and Google Play stores.

name: Employee Training Program
details: Implement a new training program for employees.

todos.title: Research training topics
todos.description: Identify key areas for employee skill development.

todos.title: Hire trainers
todos.description: Find experienced trainers for selected topics.

todos.title: Create training schedule
todos.description: Outline session timings and participant groups.

todos.title: Feedback survey
todos.description: Gather feedback from employees post-training.

name: Product Launch
details: Launch the new product line for Q4.

todos.title: Finalize product design
todos.description: Confirm all design specifications and materials.

todos.title: Market research
todos.description: Analyze the market trends and consumer feedback.

todos.title: Set pricing strategy
todos.description: Define pricing for each product in the line.

todos.title: Organize launch event
todos.description: Plan and schedule the product launch event.

todos.title: Social media campaign
todos.description: Start social media campaign to generate buzz.

name: Q4 Financial Audit
details: Conduct financial audit for Q4 to prepare for the end-of-year review.

todos.title: Gather financial statements
todos.description: Collect statements from all departments.

todos.title: Verify account reconciliations
todos.description: Check that all accounts are balanced and reconciled.

todos.title: Audit revenue streams
todos.description: Examine all revenue sources for accuracy.

todos.title: Review expense reports
todos.description: Ensure all expenses are accounted for and accurate.

todos.title: Final audit summary
todos.description: Compile findings and prepare for presentation.
